event.description: Asus zenfone Smartphone Android Terbaik The categorization of reading types aims for readers to know what the purpose of reading is. The reading types make it easier for students to apply certain background information and cultural experience which assist them in getting the meaning. In this regard, Brown (2004: 186-187) proposes three types of reading, namely academic reading, job-related reading, and personal reading. Genres of reading that belong to academic reading are textbooks, theses, essays, papers, reference material, editorials and the like. Types of reading which are job-related reading are such as memos, applications, schedules, letters/emails, reports, and so forth. Asus zenfone Smartphone Android Terbaik Genres of reading that belong to personal reading are such as newspapers, magazines, invitations, novels, short stories, etc.
